wikipedia_page.main: Kelly Salmon (aka Kelly Natelle) (born 23 March 1987 in Harlow, Essex, United Kingdom) is an English actress and fashion model. She appeared in the first TV commercial for NSPCC in 1991. She later became a primary school teacher in Hertfordshire.

response: Can you please add Kelly Salmon and Duncan Duff to this list as I can't work out how to. Thanks. Jordan5001 19:21, 20 August 2007 (UTC)

At the 23rd Young Artist Awards, held in April 2002 in Studio City, California, both Matt Adams and Kelly Salmon were nominated for their roles. At the ceremony, the series was counted as an American production, and the nominations were received on behalf of Noggin.
|Best Performance in a TV Comedy Series: Supporting Young Actress||Kelly Salmon||
*Bex, played by Kelly Salmon - Roddy's daughter from the year 2027 who also inherits her father's ability to see ghosts.
